entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
